climbs.name: Pega
climbs.fa: Logan Grosz, Luke Kretschmar, Chris Hirsch; 2020

content.description: SDS on right angling seam. Climb up and right using slopers and edges. Top out on the right shoulder of the wall.
content.location: Right most side of the wall.

content.description: SDS on seam in middle of the wall. Make a big move out left then compress up the feature to a big deadpoint to the lip. Top out over the notch.
content.location: Center of the wall, finishes in the notch.

climbs.name: Flaco
climbs.fa: Chris Hirsch, Logan Grosz, Luke Kretschmar; 2020

content.description: Share the same sit start in the seam with 'Malandro'. After a couple moves, cut right onto the white face then up over the bulges. This one has got cool grips and exciting moves up high.
content.location: Starts in center of the wall, tops out on the right side of the upper bulge.

content.description: Stand start, underclinging on a right angling feature. Work up and slightly left on crimps and slopers to the peak of the wall. Sustained movement leads to the crux of gaining the lip. Easy top out.
content.protection: 3-4 pads at least is nice. Flat landing but tall.

content.description: An isolated wall that's worth the hike. Grades range from V4 to V9 and top outs are around 12' to 18' high with a perfectly flat landing. Wall is NW facing in a logged area and on top of a ridge, so it can be windy and catches sun in the afternoon.
